p: A discontinuous plasma membrane, indicative of a loss of integrity of the parasite, is a major feature of cell death by necrosis. In this type of cell death, there are also alterations to the mitochondria, ATP depletion, generation of reactive oxygen species, and cytoplasm vacuolization [ 70]. The essential oils of Melaleuca alternifolia [ 61], Xylopia frutescens [ 20], Xylopia laevigata [ 20], Cymbopogon citratus [ 44, 61], Cymbopogon giganteus [ 44], Cymbopogon nardus [ 44], and Cymbopogon schoenantus [ 44] presented this type of action.
